title: LF DUO PARTNER/RANKED 5's TEAM SILVER 3
body: Hi, My name is Josh My IGN is iHex, last season I peaked at gold 5 and I have not been able to climb the solo queue ladder consistently. So I am looking for a duo partner preferably support as I main adc but Im fine with anyone as long as the person is fun and kind to play with.

replies.body:
Hey man

Silver 2 unfortunately got demoted today.

I main support and jungle being quite comfortable in those roles.

I do play more of the off meta support's then the average meta champs.

If your keen for a game chuck me an invite and we can see how we go.

Cheers

Hey Josh, 

My name is Sam, I'm a silver IV top/sup player. Looking to join a team or duo.

Currently loving playing Braum in the bot lane.

Let me know if you want to play some games.

Hey hows it going! 
I'd be glad to duo with you, i'm currently bronze III based on my early (noob) ranking earlier in the year in which i was placed in Bronze V (this was as soon as I hit ranked level, silly of me). However I have gained **a lot **of skill since then and now have climbed 3 divisions in 1 week, my MMR rating is that of Silver IV. I main Mid/Jungler/ADC and am not toxic. I have skype, curse, glad to communicate! From the mighty NZ :)
